Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi and Argentina will play Ecuador in the Quarter-Finals of the 2024 Copa America Final Stage on Thursday, July 4 at the NRG Stadium in Houston, TX.
Messi sustained a right groin/adductor injury during the match against Chile on June 15 and sat out during the match against Peru on June 29.
Messi is back training ahead of the Quarter-Finals against Ecuador, so fans can hopefully get the chance to see him in action.
Ecuador most recently faced off against Mexico on June 30, which ended in a draw 0-0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tickets to the match are completely sold out, but fans can score resale tickets at reasonable prices through Vivid Seats, SeatGeek, StubHub or Ticketmaster.
The cheapest tickets start at $138 before fees on SeatGeek.
Copa America 2024 will take place in 14 cities in the United States between June 20 and July 14, 2024.
MetLife Stadium will host one final match: July 9 - Semi-Final - TBD vs. TBD.
